            "name": "Smart Home Automation System",
            "description": "A software system for controlling smart home devices (lights, thermostats, security cameras) through a central dashboard or voice commands. It would include device pairing, custom scene creation (e.g., 'Movie Night' scene to dim lights and lower thermostat), scheduling, and remote access.",
            "owner": 3
        },
        {
            "id": 3,
            "created_at": "2025-08-01T13:58:55.949179Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-08-01T13:58:55.949205Z",
            "name": "Local Food Delivery Service App",
            "description": "A mobile application (iOS and Android) that connects local restaurants with customers for food delivery. Features include restaurant listings, menu Browse, order placement, payment integration, real-time order tracking, and delivery driver management.",
            "owner": 3
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "created_at": "2025-08-01T13:38:50.988156Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-08-01T13:38:50.988187Z",
            "name": "Online Learning Platform",
            "description": "A web-based application that allows users to register as students or instructors. Instructors can create and upload courses (videos, documents, quizzes), and students can enroll in these courses, track their progress, and take quizzes. The platform would include features like user profiles, search functionality for courses, and a notification system.",
            "owner": 3
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "created_at": "2025-08-01T05:36:38.475566Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-08-02T14:02:10.091049Z",
            "name": "Test project update partially",

        }
    ]
}

            "updated_at": "2025-08-03T06:38:33.694186Z",
            "title": "Incorrect Quiz Score Calculation for Multiple Attempts",
            "description": "When a student takes a quiz multiple times, the system sometimes incorrectly averages the scores instead of taking the highest score, or it might not update the score at all after a second attempt. This leads to inaccurate performance tracking for students.",

            "updated_at": "2025-08-03T06:45:48.622762Z",
            "message": "Checked the network requests; the category parameter isn't being sent. Likely a UI binding issue.",
            "bug": 17,
            "commenter": 3
        },
        {
            "id": 7,
            "created_at": "2025-08-02T10:43:35.212417Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-08-02T10:43:35.212442Z",
            "message": "Root cause seems to be an issue in the calculateQuizScore function. It's likely not handling subsequent attempts correctly. Needs to be investigated urgently.",
            "bug": 15,
            "commenter": 3
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "created_at": "2025-08-01T05:39:04.839135Z",

        }
    ]
}
